get_to_know_desc: Stay unique and be Yourself At ZAD Group, we welcome all dimensions of diversity. We believe diversity is the key to success. Being ourselves, and contributing with our uniqueness, makes us all grow. We strive to have a multi-cultural environment where each of the individuals can be themselves.

what_we_do_desc: ZAD Holding is specialized in operating and creating F&B concepts based in Saudi Arabia. Currently we operate 3 well known brands all over the Kingdom.
marble_slab_desc: A leading provider of hand-mixed ice cream and the creator of the frozen slab technology recognized in the United States.
cakes_order_moments: Cakes Order Every Year to Celebrate a Milion Moments
american_cookies_desc1: Delicious cookies, endless choices, perfect for everyone!
american_cookies_desc2: Find the perfect treat & add a personal message to make it extra special.
meez_restaurant_desc: Meez is a Fusion Middle Eastern concept that offers unique dishes and has a mix of flavors using delicious ingredients.
not_only_resaourant_desc: We celebrate with you. Together we create an atmosphere of fun just for you and your loved ones 85 Unique dishes
excellent_choice_desc: Our team is all about making you experiance memorable! We're fast , friendly, and love presenting our delicous food in a way that will amaze you.
spreading_positivity: Spreading Positivity in everything we do!

zad_desc: With over 40 years of global success and 15 years in Saudi Arabia, Marble Slab Creamery presents an outstanding franchise opportunity. Known for its hands-mixed ice cream and customizable desserts, Marble Slab has become a leader in the industry, o¬ffering fresh ingredients and a unique experience for every customer.
our_commitment_desc: Initial & ongoing support: Assistance in site selection, store design, pre-opening procedures, and ongoing operational supports.
comprehensive_training_desc: In-depth training to help franchisees succeed from day one.
marketing_branding_desc: Access to brand assets, marketing tools, and regional advertising campaigns.
continued_innovation_desc: Stay ahead of industry trends with new product development and seasonal promotions
recruitment-desc: We’re looking for talented individuals to grow with us. Send your CV to recuritment@zad-ksa.com and be part of something amazing!
